reviewText: Now finally a documentent about the classic 1978 film and i don't care that it's region 2 i mean i wasn't going to watch it on my tv anyway but the artwork is awesome especially on the DVD so if you want a good document about Halloween well this is what to get
Great art work, however it doesn't play on my blu ray player. But I have the Bio USA version and this art work with the USA Bio disc that is longer than the British version makes it perfect.
